title: Atomic Habits
content: A practical book on building good habits and breaking bad ones using small, consistent changes.

title: Deep Work
content: Explains how focused, distraction-free work can help you learn faster and produce better results.

title: The Psychology of Money
content: Talks about how people think about money, wealth, and financial decisions in real life.

title: Ikigai
content: Explores the Japanese concept of finding purpose and meaning in everyday life.

title: Think Like a Monk
content: Shares lessons from monk life to reduce stress, improve focus, and live more calmly.
